permissions: User must have a broker membership for the application broker (broker_memberships with organization_id equal to customer_application.broker_id).
side_effects: Creates a new customer from the application data, sets its credit limit, marks the application approved, and adds the application user as a customer member; may attempt company address geocoding during customer creation.
validation_notes: --customer-application and --credit-limit are required. Approval fails if the customer application is already approved. On invalid approval, the API returns Record Invalid (XBE-422).
